content.detailedDescription: Watching the night sky with a nv-ir device, i captured a ufo traveling n to ne, when it disappeared above garage i noticed there was a ufo fleet behind it, they flew too fast to be birds and moving very quick in formation at night following a ufo?I don't think it was birds because they were at the same altitude as the first ufo (main object).
content.summary: Ufo followed by smaller ufo fleet

content.detailedDescription: I observed a silent black shape shifting object travel from east to west then disappear into the clouds. at first i thought it was a large bird until it disappeared into the clouds. i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Silent shapeshifting object

content.detailedDescription: I was woken up and a giant insect was standing right above me, so i slapped it and it went away.
content.summary: No ufo only entity

content.detailedDescription: Disappear. i am a professional driver and was on my route when this occurred, at 9:03 pm. the object was a similar color to a cool-white led light.  the time span was too short to even film, but i immediately called my wife to tell her what i'd seen right after. it was a bizarre thing to watch. it just stopped in it's path, went from being perfectly even with the horizon to being at a 45 degree angle and went straight down and out of sight.
content.summary: While driving southbound 93 on outskirts of ely, nv, i saw a horizontal bar of bluish-white light go from traveling in a south to north direction, to descend straight down abruptly and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is nj im report this event from iran.That is real event because this event happened 2 time for my self,the first time i saw ufo in in march/25/2010 at 3 or 2 am i saw from my grand mother house yard in ardastan اردستان small province of asfah far from my slef in sky  . i saw that ufo get seven beam light and come to me but dont heart me and after 10 or 15 min got lost from my eye.This is first time i saw. and the second time saw again in march/24/2016 happen again at that time again but this time at first i saw 1 ufo and after 15 min 4 ufo behind that ufo and fly behind that ufo i think that ufo is mother ufo.Recently i told my cousin and she came to me and saw that ufo and she want took video but she cant i dont know why they can watch ufo with eye but the camera cant took viedo. the ufos fly 2 hrous and then got lost from our eyes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: So frightening

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i went out on sunday 9/11 for a nice walk at parque can mercader at evening. 
we were talking about things that we had to do the next day, when i saw an orange-red intense light up in the sky, then she looked up and saw it too. i can't guess the distance because just saw a "large point" of red-orange light. at that moment, we didn't think that it would be an ufo at all; personally i thought it was a drone or something so. but after 2 or 3 seconds, the light started to hover around, and then apparently faded out slowly and finally vanished completely. after a few seconds there was nothing remaining of that light, but then my gf saw two grey and dark objects, cigar-shaped, that flew fast in parallel position,  to the east, just above the place where the red light was seconds before. i  could only see one of those two objects, but it was very difficult because the sky was dark and the object had no visible lights. 
we were confused because we could not understand what we had seen, started to ask ourselves if it was a plane or a drone... but it performed completely different. there were airplanes at south, near barcelona airport, but this strange light was red, static, absolutely silent, bigger than plane headlights, and looking to the east. it all happened with some other people by there, but it was so short in time that we thought that no one else saw that, and that we had no time to take our smartphones to take a picture. nobody talked about this in the area, but the two of us saw it.
content.summary: Bright red static light that vanishes,  and then 2 grey fast objects pass straight over

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside and looked up into the cloudy sky.

i saw a craft with red lights hovering above me. i noticed it because it was clearly an object and i've never seen an object just hover in one spot. then it moved quickly in one direction (i think west, but am not sure), and hovered again. i went inside to get my camera to take a picture and video. when i came out i captured one still image of the craft, and then i started the video. during the twenty seconds of video, the craft makes a wobbly path north, eventually descending, apparently into the catalina mountains, near finger rock.  i thought that i was viewing a ufo. i lost sight of the object after the descent.
content.summary: Craft with red lights hovered, moved, hovered then followed path of descent north toward finger rock

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside about 9:45 pm on the steps smoking a cigarette.  i often look at the sky and stars at night when i go out to smoke.  and i saw a round ball of white light. unlike anything i have ever seen.  it was just sitting there.  and then just gone.  no trace of it.  i looked and looked to see if i saw it again or where it may have went and i saw nothing. i think it may have been a ufo.  it wasnt a plane, it wasnt a helicopter.  i saw no other lights in the sky at all.  and i didnt hear anything at all.  i was excited knowing that i had seen something.  but afraid people would laugh at me or not take me serious.
content.summary: It was round ball of light that just sat there for about 20 seconds, then dissappeared.  now sign or trace

content.detailedDescription: I was heading west along 78th street when i notcied a very bright light in the sky, near the sun. i assumed it was perhaps a chrome airplane, maybe reflecting light from the sun, but it did not apear to move. vertically, it was roughly in line in the sun and horizontally it was a few degrees to the left. though much smaller, it was still larger than any other star and was about as bright as the sun. i had some trouble taking pictures of it intitially, but that was likely due the proximity of the object to the sun, rather than any anomalous phenomena. after blocking the sun with a tree, and zooming in, i was able to take a few shots of the object. i continued to walk down the road and when i was about 100 meters from harlem ave. the object began to move west untill i lost sight of it. it should be noted that while to my perspective it appeared to be one object, it may have been two as shown in my pictures.
content.summary: I saw a light as bright as the sun, a short distance to the north of it. it hovered for a time before moving west.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving west on cologne port republic rd, near naafac in absecon nj and stopped to take pictures of a rainbow in the clouds.  there were also unusual cloud formations.  i was looking through photos yesterday and never noticed these 2 shiny objects in the lower left quadrant before.  i can't determine what they are or if they have any significance.  if you have any opinions i would love to hear them.
content.summary: I was driving west on cologne port republic rd, near naafac in absecon nj and stopped to take pictures of a rainbow in the clouds.  there were also unusual cloud formations.  i was looking through photos yesterday and never noticed these 2 shiny objects

content.detailedDescription: It was like fireball when i saw it coming from west the eucalyptus trees behind the school building . i was in the school premises to pickup my younger brother when he came back from picnic. it was 9:30 pm .When the ufo came  closer i noticed that it had no sound or any kind of engine noise.When it was flying above the school roof just may be 100 ft height i saw transparent walls of that object.There were some kind of bulbs glowing slowly and then turning off.So it was kind of flashing but slow manner. almost 7-8 minutes i saw it then slowly unlike airplane it was gone in to east direction.On the next day some students who werw studying on the terrace reported the same incident.It was published in local news paper also.
content.summary: Ufo came from behind the eucalyptus trees .It was initially like fire ball but afterwards it was flying object with transparent walls without any noise

content.detailedDescription:
1.We were down the road from my house looking down the lake at where the mine had its tailing pond breach the day before.
2.It was starting to get dark and we were in the middle of no where no city lights.
3. equipment working but then i noticed it wasn't on the ground.
4.I can't remember
5.Looking at the pics made me think but then my boyfriend says its nothing. i saved the pics and still think its something.
6. i can't remember
content.summary: Weird lights in sky moving up after mine disaster the shape and colour in the pics really get me

content.detailedDescription:
Smoking on my back deck in the dark, looking at cassiopeia i saw peripherally a flash like a star flaring. the magnitude of the object was slightly smaller than the north star. it flashed/flared into my sight, and ascended away from earth rotating on a counter-clockwise turn. as it ascended away through the turn it faded more and more from my sight until it disappeared before going through 1/4 of a full circle.

this is the 3rd time i've seen this, spread out over the past week, always in the same general area of cassiopeia and the andromeda galaxy, always in a time window between 9 p.M. and 11 p.M. cst. no one has answered my question as to what it could be. i know what a satellite looks like and the type of path they take, and this was not that. i know what high altitude jets look like and it was not that, the pulsation was too short, it did not repeat, and the objects always appeared to be ascending away from the earth.
content.summary: Appeared as a flash of light, orb shaped, great distance, counterclockwise ascent near casisopeia

content.detailedDescription: Driving east down valley rd into e valley rd, observed 3 large sets of 5 bright lights in the eastern sky.  thought at first they were houses lit up on the hills near chaffee crossing, when i realized it was the wrong angle to view the hills i thought they might be planes flying low in formation.  only the set of lights on the left seemed to be moving, the other two were clearly stationary.  something seemed odd about the lights, i wasn't able to see them by the end of e valley rd after they were obscured by tree cover so i drove in circles for 20 min trying to see them again or anything that could explain the lights, like aircraft landing at the nearby airport, but didn't see anything.  likely it was nothing, but an uneasy feeling about the lights made me go ahead and report it.
content.summary: 3 sets of 5 lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
About a month ago my wife and i saw something very similar to this.  i went into the house to get my camera.  when i came back it was no longer there. 
today, 9/16/16, we witnessed the same thing.  we were relaxing outside on our patio and i looked up.  there was a white dot in the sky.  it was pretty much stationary.  i asked my wife to get my camera.  it had not moved and i went back in to get my telephoto lens.  a 55 to 300mm zoom.
i took several pictures of the object.  not having anything for size reference i could not determine the altitude that it was at.  the sky was perfectly clear and what struck me interesting was that there was not air traffic the whole time we were outside.  we were outside for approximately 45 minutes.  we went into the house to prepare dinner.  i checked on it several times and it was still visible.  so the entire time it was directly overhead was probably an hour.  i stopped looking at that time.  

it was silent and appeared to be stationary.  it did move from the west to the east over the hour we watched it.  if i were to estimate the distance it traveled in that timeframe...I would put it at 1 to 2 miles at the most.

our dogs were outside with us and showed no behavior change or even sensed what we were seeing.  i used a nikon 12 mp camera with the telephoto to take the pictures.  i probably shot over 100.  it was just so slow moving that i took several in hopes of getting some clear images.

i thought it might have been a weather balloon.  it moved so slowly that i felt it probably wasn't a balloon.  i am attaching several pictures for your review.  maybe its a balloon...Maybe not.
content.summary: Looked up in the sky and saw a while dot directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Visible outline of craft. low rumble like distant train. never an angle change in the light patterns during travel or rotation. came from the horizon, left towards another. maybe 2500 feet in altitude.
content.summary: Witness craft  move from west to overhead towards east, rotated then moved north

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard of the house i was living at the time.
i tried to telepathically call any telepathy capable beings in space and time.
i saw the object coming from the side of the moon.
the objects where cloaked and were two big mother ships the side of 2 football stadiums each and cloaked and only the warp engine/antigravity engine glowing was partly visible.
i was making a telepathy call and something told me to wake up out of the meditational calling and to look up and take pictures and a particular place in the skies, i felt a bean of light went into my mind and put messages into my mind to the world accounting to more than 8 pages long.
after this i was implanted with a chip in my right arm on the median nerve which controls emotions, perception and all your senses which means it is posible due to this knowledge they are able to feel, see, hear, and experience everything i am experiencing like an avatar.
content.summary: 2 triangle motherships with a scout ship no more than 500tf from ground under the clouths

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i walked outdoors to our patio on the northwest side of our new country home at approximately 3:15 am et in gardner, ma. we're new to the neighborhood, so we are diligent about opening and closing the door silently as not to disturb the neighbors who often have their windows open during the warm summer months. being a sound engineer, i immediately noticed a deafening quiet that was unmistakable to me. no crickets, no wind, no cars, nothing. 

i whispered "wow, it's really quiet out here. a little too quiet". my wife said nothing. it was dark enough so that you could not see the sky behind the trees. i realized we had a huge moon the night before, so the 'no moon' darkness had struck me as weird. elapsed time we were outside was about 2-3 minutes. we were both facing west toward our neighbors house when we both saw a single spherical light appear, with no dynamics in luminosity. nothing at first, then right to full-on brightness. the singular amber / orange glow was the same exact color as the street lamp but much brighter, and the shape was spherical instead of oval, about the size of a baseball or softball. 

the street lamp seemed to be about 10+ feet directly behind the object we saw. the object kept an altitude approximately 5 feet below the street lamp from our perspective. the glowing sphere never stopped moving at any point since it appeared. it moved at about the speed of a house fly, in a perfect counter-clockwise circle, with a slightly accelerated figure 8 pattern every few revolutions. the object moved in a circle pattern that was about 2 feet in diameter. it left a trail of light behind itself in the same color that faded linearly, but was overrun by the sphere again before the light trail fully dissipated. 

i whispered, "do you see that?". standing slightly in front of me, my wife leaned toward my viewpoint on the patio and said "yea, what is that?". it seemed that once this object felt us notice it's presence, it disappeared with no fade, instant off and gone. the object was gone even before i could open my camera app. i noticed some trees between the object we saw and our patio. so i waited until daylight this morning to see if it could have been street lamp light refracting off of a bunch of shiny leaves, but there are barely any leaves to obstruct the view apparently. we never saw anything block the perspective of the object while it appeared and danced for approximately 15-20 seconds in total. 

after it disappeared, i came to my senses and opened my camera app. i was surprised to see a camera flash to our far right from across the street. i was sure the neighbors saw the object too and were taking a photo, while forgetting to disable the camera flash. when i looked over, i saw another 5000k temp flash in the gloss of the neighbors car, but no light hit the street or tree next to where the source would be. neighbors were asleep with all lights off an nobody was outside at all. no activity so far yet tonight.
content.summary: Baseball-sized spinning amber orb witnessed

content.detailedDescription: Noticed formation of nine disc like objects flying above houses as i looked south. they stayed in a tight diamond formation throughout my observation.  lasted approx 10 seconds. the formation flew behind trees.
content.summary: Bright silvery group of ogjects 9 in total in a diamond formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving family member to dr. appointment. passenger was resting and i was driving and looking at the chemtrail when i noticed a large white light slightly above the chemtrail. it stayed stationary for about ten seconds abdul then it got fuzzy.Around the edges and then i seen it disappear.

other sightings of ufos have unnerved me but this sighting was not scary. i think of it fondly.
content.summary: Looking at chemtrail, i notice large white light near it, then ilight fades out and disappears

content.detailedDescription: From my living room, around 8:00 p.M., i observed two cylindrical bright objects in the western sky above the mountains for a lengthy period of time.  one was a brilliant red and the other was a bright white.  they were directly across from each other. i went out on the deck with a pair of binoculars to see if i could see them more clearly. too far away for anything more than bright lights and they were not moving.  there was no sound. i continued to watch.  i called my neighbors and they watched them from their house.  we were talking to each other on the phone. finally the white object that was on the right side slowly moved downward and to the right.  there was a slight cloud mass that it eventually slid behind.  the red object moved downward and to the right as well.  we all lost sight of it at that point.  i thought it was gone but it reappeared just below the cloud mass and then disappeared behind the mountains. the red object did not reappear. we had both called the sheriffs office to report the sightings. they thanked us and that was that.  we have no idea what they were. no stars around.
content.summary: Two objects observed in the western sky. directly across from each other for a lengthly period of time. the white object eventually changed direction to a lower elevation. red object also changed direction a little later.

content.detailedDescription:
We've made a number of reports to mufon of ufo round similar sightings recently and have seen the same ufo in different parts of the sky (2 at one time on a couple of occasions in different parts of the sky)

friday, after taking a number of photos with my iphone of the round ufo again, i came inside to download them and was surprised to see a glowing human shape sitting on the ground in the bottom left of two of the photos not 20' in front of where i was standing while taking picture of the ufo in the sky, that appeared to be watching the ufo in the sky. i enlarged the photos and increased the highlights to see a glowing human shape as well as a large black cigar shaped ufo above the tree line, but below the ufo in the distance. then the ufo went straight down out of view in the blink of an eye.

the 2nd photo looked as if the body had turned around to look at me. i didn't see any of this while taking the photos, but the body truly glowed when downloaded.

later i went out and used our flash and in 2 photos a slanted vertical beam appears to be going down toward where the entity was seen sitting. the cigar shape had disappeared as well as the ufo above.

later we saw the ufo in the ne sky again.

we haven't seen any lights or ufo for the past 2 days.

i've tried downloading the photos a number of times. i can send them to mufon via email if requested.
content.summary: Glowing humanoid figure and cigar shaped ufo not seen by naked eye appeared in photos

content.detailedDescription: Received a phone call from my father that a friend spotted what they believed to be a ufo in the sky.  that person had witnessed it being stationary for hours and we did at work as well.
content.summary: Hours of this object just being stationary in the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home friday 9/16/16 evening from buda, texas.  i was heading west on 1604 and i was close to the judson road exit i believe.  my view was towards the west as i was driving that direction.  the sky was clear and you could see stars in the evening sky.  minimal clouds.

at approximately 11:24pm i witnessed a flash of light towards the west horizon.  it was brief and it was behind a cloud.  the best description would be if you were to see lighting in the clouds, but you could not visibly see the lighting itself.  having seen that before a lighting flash tends to be blue/white.  when i saw this flash it was red and white.  more on the reddish side, but with a white at the intense portion of the flash.

had i not been looking in that direction i would have never seen it as it was quite brief.  there were other cars around me on the highway that evening and i am positive someone else had to have seen it as well.

my personal view is that i saw an astronomical event of some kind such as a meteor, but i could not see the object as it was behind a cloud.  i am reporting this just so it is on record.  the only strange thing about this, is that i have seen meteors before and they tend to follow a path.  this event looked more like a flash of lighting, but red.  so, it is a bit unusual.
content.summary: Flash of red light in the clouds toward the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting in my kitchen for my friend to arrive for a lift. i noticed a black object floating up in the air. being into ufos i quickly grabbed my phone and recorded it. at the time i considered it could be a balloon and i was also quite late already, which is why i didnt film for any longet. it was only when i got home and zoomed in on the video that i realised what a strange shape it was. i have watched hundreds of thousands of ufo videos and i honestly feel this may be one of the clearest, hardest to dismiss cases ever. it also seemed that the object was changing shape and structure rapidly, between frames. i do not believe this shape matches anything else ever seen or recorded. i also have screenshots that seem to show this object detach part of itself during flight. please let me know what you think.
content.summary: Strange, angular black craft filmed for 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to california.    i flew out of mdw heading to lax, when about approximately an 1hr left on my flight i saw these 3 lights pulsating brightly on the ground, and inside them there was another light even brighter, like a flash of a camera color and it moved around inside.  it went from one orbe to the other.   i was on the airplane sitting on the right side of the plane 5 or 6 seats at the end of the plane behind the wing.  the orbes were very big, not sure the size, but i estimate the size of a football stadium.   the plane that i was on was headed to lax, which means i would have been looking out the window facing the north and south would have been opposite of me and the nose of the plane would be pointing toward the west which is where i was going.  when we landed i asked the pilot if he saw the orbes and he replied that they were solar panels.  i laughed,  i know that solar panels don't glow and pulsate bright light like that.  anyway i know what i saw and have to admit this was my first encounter with a ufo.... however these guys were on the ground and not actually flying.
content.summary: I was a passenger on southwest flight 2013 flying from mdw to lax.  about an 1 hr 18 mins left on or flight, we saw 3 orbes on the ground glowing really bright and they seem to pulsating.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was sleeping and something woke me up at 330 am.

2.Multi colors

3. i need it was a ufo

4.Came towards me, moved to the right, then moved to the left, backed up.

5.The hair was standing up on my neck, i was scared.

6. i watched for over an hour, it was still there when i went back to sleep.
content.summary: It was roughly 30 miles off shore.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8 pm on september 18 my stepson came into our apartment and til me our neighbor was watching some lights in the sky. i grabbed my binoculars and went out into my 2nd story balcony and looking into the southern sky i observed some pulsating lights in the distance. the object was approximately 2 miles away and at the altitude of a high flying helicopter. being color blind i'm not sure of the color of the lights. the object appeared at first to be hoovering but was actually moving slowly from east to west with no elevation change. i was to far away to hear any noise. my stepson joined me and we watched the object for another 10 minutes and then went inside. about 15 minutes later i came out and watched it for another few minutes until coming back inside my apartment making the total time of seeing about 45 minutes. an hour later when i walked my dog object was not in sight.
content.summary: Pulsating lights that hoovered and/or was moving slowly from east to west with no elevation change

content.detailedDescription:
(my english is not that well)
it was a cool summer night and i was lying in our back yard. i was watching sky and thinking about stars that suddenly i noticed a strike of light in sky. i was sure that i could'nt be a lightning cause it was summer and in my city we dont have much cloudy and stormy days. weather was clear and there was no cloud in the sky. 2 or 3 seconds later it came again but it moved (like u couldnt say where it is at a moment) rapidly in sky. it was some sort of round thing that showed light randomly from some spots on it. but it really look like lightning but it was round. i have no idea if it was one object that moved or several objects. there is and airport near us and i see planes almost every time but they fly near ground for landing and u can see them even in nights. but this object was not a plane im pretty sure. after several seconds it just disappeared like nothing has happened. i went to house and didnt talk about it with anybody even my family and i dont know the reson. i knew about ufo's back then, but some thing affected me not to talk about it and im sure it was not me cause i tell every one every thing. after a year or two a friend of mine came to me and i told him my ufo story with no reason! he was the first person who knew my story. then he said yeah i saw a ufo just couple of days ago!He said he saw a pyramid shape ufo in his way to his grand parents home. i have no idea what made me to tell a person who had witnessed a ufo recently. maybe it was an accident. but im sure that ufo had effected me somehow.
content.summary: It was like light teleporting in sky and shifting shape like it was made of lightining

content.detailedDescription: Hello, my name is michael reardon. i'm currently a student at slippery rock university double majoring in physics/mechanical engineering, and this is my ufo story. let me start off by saying: i usually try to rationalize things before i come to conclusions, but i can tell you that this wasn't ball lighting, dust particles, or bugs. i was doing my statics homework at 10:20-10:27pm saturday september 18th when suddenly i notoced a bright dot out of the corner of my eye followed by my neighbors dog barking like crazy. upon noticing these things, i then turned towards the window and saw a very bright, basketball sized, white/silver, beautifully uniquely shaped ufo (orb). this orb was like nothing ive ever seen or experienced before. the best way i can describe it is somewhat angelic. it's shape was mainly spherical, but looked like it was a spherical shape hard to comprehend(like a 2 dimensional creature seeing a 3 dimensional sphere). it's almost like it came from a higher dimensional plane, managed to somehow project to our plane, gave off a feeling of power and love, and was accompanied by a light humming sound. i hypothesize that  mathematically, this type of "dimensional projection" can be explained by mapping from a 4 dimensional vector plane(their reality) onto a 3 dimensional vector plane(our reality) (linear algebra transformations). this would allow an orb of possibly a higher dimension to travel to lower dimensions and be visible to us 3 dimensional creatures. the orb's travel path was linear, traveling from the woods (behind the back parking lot of my building) to a lamp post (in the back parking lot). while traveling, it was pulsating. again, i was absolutely astonished by this object. the duration of time it took the orb to travel from the woods to the lamp post was approximately 1 minute. when the orb neared the light post, it caused the lights to dim initially. when the lights brightened, the orb started to almost "dance" around them in some sort of way. the object appeared to be metallic and have some sort of electric and magnetic field around it. with that being said, it's almost like the orb was trying to "charge" itself by interacting it's magnetic field against the electric field emitted by the light (this is explained by the solinoid-coil experiment to create a charge). as the orb did this it started to brighten. after staring at this orb baffled, confused, and coming to the realization that i wasn't seeing things, i took out my phone and started recording it. after a couple seconds of recording i waved my hands to try to get it's attention. upon seeing me, the orb started to zigzag from one point in space to another instantly (null geodesic) and then suddenly vanished instantly. also, the object appears to disappear traveling to the left. i submitted the original unedited video i took below so if you want to see how the object actually takes off, slow down the time frames in the video at the time gap from 32s- 36s. thank you very much for taking the time to read this and watch the video. and as a junior physics and engineering student i ensure the accuracy of the theory and invite you to look into the physics/mathematical topics after watching the video to try to make sense of these ufos and their nature. hope to hear back from you soon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: The objects shape was spherical but hard to comprehend. it radiated feeling and a distinct light
